Text: On this day the Lord has acted; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
Thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
If then you have been raised with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.
Christ has entered, not into a sanctuary made with hands, a copy of the true one, but into heaven itself, now to appear in the presence of God on our behalf.
You shall receive power when the Holy Ghost has come upon you; and you shall be my witness in Jerusalem, and in all Judea, and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth.
